item.title: Scaling generative AI in the cloud: Enterprise use cases for driving secure innovation
item.description: In our technical guide, “Accelerating Generative AI Innovation with Cloud Migration” we outline how IT and digital transformation leaders can tap into the power and flexibility of Azure to unlock the full potential of generative AI. The post Scaling generative AI in the cloud: Enterprise use cases for driving secure innovation appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/scaling-generative-ai-in-the-cloud-enterprise-use-cases-for-driving-secure-innovation/
